body_html: So my recommendation would be to never work with NaNs (if you have some then you probably have a bug). I don't think it's worth keeping CPU and GPU NaN handling consistent if there's any possibility that it might decrease performance.
body_text: So my recommendation would be to never work with NaNs (if you have some then you probably have a bug). I don't think it's worth keeping CPU and GPU NaN handling consistent if there's any possibility that it might decrease performance.
body: So my recommendation would be to never work with NaNs (if you have some then you probably have a bug). I don't think it's worth keeping CPU and GPU NaN handling consistent if there's any possibility that it might decrease performance.
